GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, PDF, PPT, PPTX, XLS, XLSX, TXT, DOC, DOCX

Platform.Processor: A7 Chip with 64-bit Architecture and M7 Motion Coprocessor

Display.Other Display Features: Multi-touch, 360-degree Readability, Oleophobic Coating on Front, 500 cd / m2 Max Brightness, Wide Screen, Finger Print Resistant, Retina Display, Contrast Ratio - 800:1

Internet & Connectivity.Charging Point: Charging via USB to Computer System or Power Adapter

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports M4V, H.264, MP4, MOV, Full HD

Other Features.Additional Features: Mobile Network, Multiple Languages and Characters Support, Reminders, Calculator, Alarm, Calendar, Clock, Game Center, Remote, Passbook, Lightning Connector, Audio Calling, AirPlay Mirroring and Video out to Apple TV (2nd and 3rd Generation), Video Mirroring and Video Out Support
Other Features.Sensors: Three-axis Gyro Sensor, Digital Compass, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer, Fingerprint Identity Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and for in the box accessories
